titleStmt.title: A vvarning from the Lord, to the town of Cambridge.
titleStmt.author: Harwood, John.

notesStmt.note: Dated and signed at end: Cambridge 14. day of the 5. month. 1655. By one of his servants who is despised of the world, known by the name of John Harrwood.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
